entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 6.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
